subject: Fashion
title: Blockchain for Supply Chain Transparency
description: A 60-second lesson on Blockchain for Supply Chain Transparency.

hook.text: You can track a FedEx package in real time. But you can't trace where your shirt was actually made.

buildup.text: Fashion supply chains span dozens of countries and hundreds of subcontractors. Transparency is near zero.

discovery.text: Blockchain creates a tamper-proof digital record tracking every step from raw material to store shelf.

climax.text: Technology enables transparency, but it can't replace the will to be honest about how clothes are made.
